oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Does mechanical weed control take effect on Sonchus arvensis?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Lötjönen, Timo
Vanhala, Petri
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The main aims of this research were to study the biology of perennial weeds and to find out the best non-chemical control methods for Sonchus arvensis. The most effective control method seemed to be bare fallowing.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Lötjönen, Timo and Vanhala, Petri (2003) Does mechanical weed control take effect on Sonchus arvensis? Paper at: NJF's 22nd congress "Nordic agriculture in global perspective", Turku, Finland, July 1-4, 2003.
